com.snapscreen.sdk.client.websearch

Interface WebSearchService


  • public interface WebSearchService
    Service for doing web-search

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Searches images relevant to the queried term and locale.

      Searches web pages relevant to the queried term and locale.

      Searches videos relevant to the queried term and locale.

    • Method Detail

      • searchImages

        @GET(value="web-search/image")
io.reactivex.Observable<WebSearchResponse<WebSearchImageResult>> searchImages(@Query(value="term")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String term,
                                                                                                             @Query(value="locale")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String locale,
                                                                                                             @Query(value="tvChannelCode")
                                                                                                             java.lang.String tvChannelCode,
                                                                                                             @Query(value="timestampRef")
                                                                                                             long timestampRef,
                                                                                                             @Query(value="page")
                                                                                                             int page,
                                                                                                             @Query(value="size")
                                                                                                             int size)
        Searches images relevant to the queried term and locale.
        Parameters:
        term - The queried term.
        locale - The identifier of the queried locale.
        tvChannelCode - The code of a TV channel being watched when the user made the search.
        timestampRef - The timestamp of a moment being aired on the TV channel when the user made the search.
        page - The zero-based index of a page you want to retrieve.
        size - The size of the page you want to retrieve.
        Returns:
        observable containing the Web search response
